description: This file is a C header file defining the interface for a timer handler module used in the RdkEasyMeshController component. It contains function declarations for initializing, registering, unregistering, and managing timers, along with related data types and constants.

methods.name: map_timer_register_callback
methods.description: Registers a new timer callback with specified frequency, id, args, and callback function.

methods.name: map_is_timer_registered
methods.description: Checks if a timer with the specified id is registered.

methods.name: map_timer_unregister_callback
methods.description: Unregisters the timer callback associated with a specific timer id.

methods.name: map_timer_unregister_callback_prefix
methods.description: Unregisters all timer callbacks with ids starting with the given prefix.

methods.name: map_timer_handler_fini
methods.description: Cleans up all timer resources, intended for use when exiting the application.

methods.name: map_timer_restart_callback
methods.description: Restarts a timer with the given id.

methods.name: map_timer_change_callback
methods.description: Changes the frequency and args of an existing timer.

methods.name: map_timer_remaining
methods.description: Gets the remaining time before a timer expires.
